system.description:
Magic borne out of conviction, skill at arms, and psychic power are all at your disposal, and you have begun to weave them together into a potent mix. You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain proficiency with your choice of the Awakened Mind or Sanctified Steel combat tradition. You learn a maneuver of a level you could learn from your selected tradition, and it does not count against your maneuvers known.
  • Half your herald levels count as esper levels for the purpose of the Psychic Crush feature.
  • Half your esper levels count as herald levels for the purpose of determining your smite damage and your access to the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.u220f22b3cpphtgb]{Empowered Smite} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.p9gkawegqqbxb821]{Greater Empowered Smite} features.
  • You can always choose to do psychic damage (rather than radiant) with your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.c6aiq8cd90fo3ry1]{Divine Smite}.
